attributes.action: ensure that the road traffic act and rules are applied to cyclists (pedal)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It needs to be realised that more and more cyclists are totally ignoring the law of the land  by riding through pedestianised areas at will,riding on pavements ,paying no heed to traffic lights and riding the wrong way on one way systems. Where the councils have designated cycle route these must be used.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
